laboratory_examinations.findings: Homozygous p.D18fs*13 TRDN-encoded triadin frame-shift mutation discovered in a 10-year-old female patient with a QTc of 500 ms.
Extensive T-wave inversions in precordial leads V1-V4; QTc of 500 ms.
Presence of homozygous TRDN deletion (c.del 53_56 ACAG) resulting in a frame-shift mutation (p.D18fs*13).

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Mutational analysis of TRDN in unrelated LQTS patients
laboratory_examinations.findings: 4/33 unrelated patients with either homozygous or compound heterozygous TRDN mutations identified.
Atypical for LQTS with ventricular ectopy during the test and recovery.
